name: Project Contender
description:
A shitty doom clone prototype made in Godot using the plugin "Qodot" to import maps made in TrenchBroom. Also uses assets from Miziziziz's Doom Clone tutorial:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LbyyjmOji0M&t=5s

Feedback is wanted but optional and I hope I can convey what I would like to do for this game somewhat.
